other_tests.findings: Atelectasis is noted the lung bases; diffuse gallbladder wall edema and hyperdense stones; moderate distention of the gallbladder; slight hyperenhancement of the liver edge adjacent to the gallbladder fossa; hypodensities in the kidneys; lobulated soft tissue density abutting the superior margin of the pancreas; new retroperitoneal adenopathy with a node measuring 1.8 x 2.0 cm; interval enlargement of several aortocaval nodes measuring up to 11 mm in short axis; new 7 mm retrocrural node.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Interval enlargement of several aortocaval nodes from previously 4 mm to 11 mm; new retrocrural node noted to be enlarged since prior.
